nav.div: Victor Elementary School District » COVID FAQ's for Parents

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 16px; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Is the District offering Independent Study?

span.style: font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 16px;

p.span: The District sent out enrichment packets to all students. The purpose of the packets is to provide students with activities to keep them occupied temporarily during the closure. The District is currently working on a plan for long term distance learning. You will be receiving more information after Spring Break.

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 16px;
font-size: 16px;

font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 16px;

span.span: Is the District accepting IDT’s? How can I turn in an Inter District Transfer form?

span.style: font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 16px;

span.span: The District can accept IDT’s via mail at Victor Elementary School District Attn. Pupil Services 12219 2nd Ave, Victorville, CA. 92395 or via email at

span.style: font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204); background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; text-decoration: underline; text-decoration-skip: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 16px;

p.span: Please email specific questions to the email address

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 16px;

font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 16px;

p.span: When do I register my child for the 20-21 School Year?

span.style: font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 16px;

p.span: Until further notice, all registration is stopped. We will keep parents informed when we open for registration.

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 16px;

font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 16px;

p.span: When can I do sibling enrollment? Will the timeline be extended?

span.style: font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 16px;

p.span: Until further notice, all enrollment and sibling registration is stopped. We will keep parents informed when we open for enrollment and what the new timelines will be.

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 16px;

font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 16px;

p.span: When and where are meals being served?

span.style: font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 16px;

p.span: Over Spring Break, VESD will continue to provide meals at 8 sites. Please visit vesd.net for a list of schools and remote locations where meals are being served.

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 16px;

font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 16px;

p.span: How do I request my student’s records?

span.style: font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 16px;

p.span: During the school District closure, records will not be provided. Once school resumes, you can request records and they will be provided to you within 5 business days.

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 16px;

font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 16px;

p.span: I have a 6th grader who needs to enroll in 7th grade. How do I access records?

span.style: font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 16px;

p.span: During the school closure, records will not be provided. Once school resumes, you can request records and they will be provided to you within 5 business days.

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 16px;

font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 16px;

p.span: Can I get my student’s Chromebook?

span.style: font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 16px;

p.span: At this time we are not distributing Chromebooks, however, it may be a possibility in the future. The District sent a phone survey to parents on March 20, 2020 to inquire about families' access to the internet. More information will be provided on Distance Learning when we return from Spring Break.

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: ¿Está el Distrito ofreciendo Estudio Independiente?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: El Distrito mandó paquetes de enriquecimiento a todos los estudiantes. El propósito de estos paquetes es de proveerles a estudiantes actividades para que se mantengan ocupados durante el cierre. El Distrito actualmente está trabajando en un plan para una educación a distancia de largo plazo. Recibirá más información después de las Vacaciones de Primavera.

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: ¿Está el Distrito aceptando Traslados Entre Distritos (IDT’s por sus siglas en inglés? ¿Cómo puedo entregar un formulario de Traslado Entre Distritos?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: El Distrito puede aceptar IDT’s por correo a

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Victor Elementary School District Attn. Pupil Services 12219 2nd Ave, Victorville, CA. 92395

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: o por correo electrónico a

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204); background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; text-decoration: underline; text-decoration-skip: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Por favor envíe preguntas específicas a la dirección del correo electrónico.

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: ¿Cuándo puedo matricular a mi hijo/a para el Año Escolar de 20-21?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Hasta nuevo aviso, se ha detenido toda matriculación. Les vamos a informar a los padres cuando vamos a estar abiertos para las inscripciones.

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: ¿Cuándo se llevarán a cabo las inscripciones de un hermano/a? ¿Se va a extender el plazo?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Hasta nuevo aviso, toda matriculación, incluyendo la matriculación de un hermano/a, se ha detenido. Les vamos a informar a los padres cuando vamos a estar abiertos para las inscripciones y cuáles van a ser los nuevos plazos de tiempo.

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: ¿Cuándo y dónde se están sirviendo las comidas?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Durante las vacaciones de primavera.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: VESD

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: va a continuar a proveer comidas en 8 escuelas. Por favor visite

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: vesd.net

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: para ver una lista completa de escuelas y lugares remotos donde se van a estar sirviendo las comidas.

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: ¿Cómo puedo pedir el expediente estudiantil de mi hijo/a?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Durante el cierre del Distrito Escolar, no se van a proveer expedientes. Una vez que la escuela se reanude, puede pedir expedientes académicos y se le proporcionarán dentro de 5 días hábiles.

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Tengo a un estudiante en el 6to grado que necesita ser matriculado/a en el 7mo grado. ¿Cómo puede tener acceso a su expediente?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Durante el cierre escolar, no se van a proveer expedientes. Una vez que la escuela se reanude, puede pedir expedientes académicos y se le proporcionarán dentro de 5 días hábiles.

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

br.span: ¿Puedo recoger el Chromebook de mi estudiante?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

br.span: En este momento no estamos distribuyendo Chromebooks, sin embargo, pudiera ser posible en el futuro. El Distrito envió un cuestionario telefónico a los padres el 20 de Marzo de 2020 para inquirir sobre el acceso al internet que tienen las familias. Se proporcionará más información sobre la Educación a Distancia cuando regresemos de las Vacaciones de Primavera.
